Package ca.phon.query.db

Class QueryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.phon.query.db.QueryManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XMLQueryManager
    public abstract class QueryManager
extends Object
    A factory class that returns QueryFactory and ResultSetManager instances.
